§lAny§r Brick block can be replaced with a §3Coke Oven Hatch§r. You can include up to five Hatches, as the Coke Oven requires a minimum amount of Coke Oven Bricks to successfully form.

The Hatch opens up the possibility of automation, §dauto-exporting§r both Fluid and Items out of the Coke Oven! It also works for insertion into the Coke Oven - you could consider logistics solutions such as Hoppers to give yourself a buffer.
